name: Hyper Roboboiz
description:
HYPER ROBOBOIZ

WARNING!!! THE GAME DOESN'T HAVE AI, SO IF YOU DON'T HAVE ANYONE TO PLAY IT WITH LOCALLY, DON'T DOWNLOAD IT 

A smash bros like game, with one character and a limb system.

Kick ass OST by https://twitter.com/Hux_52

https://hux52.bandcamp.com/album/hyper-roboboiz-soundtrack

3 stages

31250 posible boiz

Fully compatible with 360 Controller

Default player one controls are

Left=A

Right=D

Up=W

Down=S

Jump=H

Punch=J

Kick=K

Special=U

Grab=F

Dash=Spacebar

Start= ESC
